name: GHOST LIGHT (Hard Death Studios)
description:
Creator: Yoon Seo Kim

DESCRIPTION:

This game is about a ghost who is trying to make it to the afterlife before its to late.

COMPUTER CONTROLS:

A-D = Left and Right

Space = jump

Space + A/D = wall climb

GAME PAD CONTROLS:

Joystick(L) - move Left or Right

Square(DualShock) - jump

X(Xbox) - jump
